messages.message: hey folks, I noticed while I'm in the `My Search Projects` tab there isn't an option to start a new search, and I have to go back to the home screen to do so. do we have plans to add this functionality? for instance how Claude has the `New chat` button?
found the option in the top right corner, I was looking in the wrong spot
still might be something to take a look at - I was looking in the wrong spot, because the top left is where most platforms have the "Start new search/chat/project" button
